content:
Mi lahko kdo kaj priporoča glede rent-a-car na Rodosu? Tam bom v drugi polovici septembra, rabim neko majhno gajbico za 2, nič extra.

Trenutno kar sem brskal, so priporočali Rodoscars.gr, kateri so mi poslali ponudbo (male gajbice so od 20eur na dan naprej), spodaj pa dopisali še sledeče:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The price quoted is a complete price with no extras. It Includes full insurance, crash damage waiver and unlimited mileage. You have no EXTRAS to pay. No hidden charges!!.
What we quote is what you pay.
It also includes unlimited mileage. Our insurance also covers the windscreen wheels and underside of the car which many other car hire companies do not cover.

RODOS CARS INSURANCE & COVERAGE
All the coverage is according to the international insurance laws Natural causes 100% insurance against natural causes
•          Road assistance service
24 hours road assistance service
•         100% Full Damage Waiver
100% Full Damage Waiver (FDW fully comprehensive) NO EXCESS (Including the tires the windows and the lower part of the car) Only for luxury  cars , excess  650-950 Euros depends OF the car
 •          Fire & theft
100% insurance against third party, fire & theft
•          Personal accident Insurance
Personal accident Insurance for the driver and the passengers
•          KM FREE
       IMMEDIATE REPLACEMENT OF THE VEHICLE Immediate replacement of car in case of damage or accident under in normal situations (not drugs, alcohol, bad use of the car)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ker sem si dosedaj ravno 1x izposodil avto, me zanima, če sem kaj spregledal. Zgornje si namreč razlagam, da je to to, da zavarovanje vključuje vse potrebno in ne bo nekih presenečenj.

Priporoča kdo še kako drugo podjetje, ki renta avtomobile na Rodosu?

Hvala
author: sergio

content: Midva običajno vzameva rentacar po priporočilu agencije s katero sva pripotovala. Običajno zajemajo full zavarovanje brez odbitnih franšiz. Se je pa letos izkazalo, da je bil motorček veliko bolj priročen (zaradi gužve) kot avto.
